attributes.action: Create a mechanism for UK citizens to trigger general elections
attributes.additional_details:
Require 10 million verified signatures within three months to trigger an early election, preventing frivolous attempts whilst addressing genuine national discontent. 

Have a six-month gap between petitions to maintain stability. This balances democratic accountability with governmental continuity, ensuring leaders serve the people or face electoral consequences.
attributes.background: Waiting years for a failing government's term to end harms our nation. Citizens deserve the power to call general elections when leadership demonstrably fails us.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar actions: 

"Give the British Public the Right to Vote No Confidence in the Government" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734311

"Pass a law that triggers an early General Election via a public petition"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739383
